### Plots

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
noaa = read_csv("Data/nynoaadat.csv") |> 
  na.omit() |> 
  filter_all(all_vars(. != 0))
```
```{r}
noaa |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~snow, y = ~snwd, type = "scatter", colors = "viridis")
```
